scripts.lint: biome lint ./src && npm run lint:hooks && npm run lint:interface && npm run lint:function
scripts.lint:hooks: ! grep -rE 'useCallback|useMemo' ./src --include='*.tsx' --include='*.ts' || (echo 'Error: useCallback/useMemo are banned. Use React Compiler instead.' && exit 1)
scripts.lint:interface: ! grep -rE '^export interface |^interface ' ./src --include='*.tsx' --include='*.ts' || (echo 'Error: Use type instead of interface.' && exit 1)
scripts.lint:function: ! grep -rE '^export function |^export default function |^async function |^function ' ./src --include='*.tsx' --include='*.ts' || (echo 'Error: Use arrow functions instead of function declarations.' && exit 1)
